publication/authors: Sánchez-Rodríguez A, Pérez-Castillo Y, Schürer SC, Nicolotti O, Mangiatordi GF, Borges F, Cordeiro MNDS, Tejera E, Medina-Franco JL, Cruz-Monteagudo M
publication/title: From flamingo dance to (desirable) drug discovery: a nature-inspired approach.
dataset/redundancy:
In order to avoid excessive numbers of false
positive calls due to this imbalance, we trained the
models to optimize the metric Kappa rather than accuracy, as Kappa accounts for imbalanced number of genes
belonging to each class in training data
optimization/encoding: processing of signals and the resulting values are converted to quantile rank.
optimization/features: defaults classification labels lists or can be provided by the user
optimization/meta: authors recommend to choose the model with the highest F1-score
model/interpretability: various methods to directly determine class of genes
evaluation/confidence: qualitative description of the advantages of the presented pipeline
